reviews.sentence: Great place to stay. We enjoyed our stay at this hotel. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Meeting room facilities were perfect for our group. It has easy access to the Orlando International airport. The hotel shuttle provided excellent service from the hotel. And the breakfast was one of the best I have experienced.

Great Staff Mostly Furnishings need Update. Great if you need to get to and from the airport MCO in a hurry. Lots of restaurants in the area. Staff is super helpful just had a bad experience checking out. Breakfast at other ES is superior. Shuttle drivers friendliest and most accommodating I have come across.

Great Stay. The rooms are clean comfortable and quiet. Everyone is friendly and helpful. Of course you cant beat the free breakfast or reception. Great location if your using the airport. the van was always ready to provide a ride.

Convient location good service and clean comfortable rooms. The front desk restaurant breakfast and bar staff we extremely nice and friendly. Loved Franz the cook at breakfast very nice. The food was delicious for dinner and breakfast. the beds were very comfortable. Our room was a little warm we had difficulty cooling it down in the front part of the suite. Alos we visit the shop in the hotel and the individual was talking in Spanish on the phomne completely ignoring us waiting to be served. I finally asked her if we could by something and she got off the phone. I should not had to have asked that question. Poor quality service.
Great stay. Brakfast was great. Service was super front desk was very amicable and the shuttle service helped a lot.

great layout for sure. the hotel was a little noisier for an ES than we were used to. May just have been our neighbors. Walls seemed thin. Nice area easy to access restaurants and activities and so close to the airport. Great shuttle service.

Nice Hotel Nice Staff. I had an overall nice experience during my stay at Embassy Suites. The Staff was very nice and helpful and he rooms were very clean. I was very happy for the free shuttle service to and from the airport. Also there was free shuttle service to nearby restaurants. Lastly I like the fact that the Florida mall was only about 5 mins away by car. I have no complaints about this hotel. However the hotels infrastructure can use a little more improvement to make it even better. The mall was in close proximity to the hotel the staff was friendly and answered all questions asked and there was availability of free shuttles. there are many restaurants located nearby as well as the Orlando Florida Mall and the MCO airport. infrastructure of the hotel can be improved.

To sum it up this was a very disappointing stay at what could be a top notch hotel. Location was nice and close to the airport. The rooms were a decent size. The central eating area was great too. Breakfast was amazing great selection and the omelet station was definitely a hit with our family group. The numbers we were given to call for the airport shuttle were not in service which made it difficult to get to the hotel. What should have taken 15 20 mins took almost 45 mins. and the hotel took no responsibility for this. Thank goodness another shuttle drive from a different hotel was will to help us out as there were 7 of us. The hotel was under construction during our visit and made it very difficult to maneuver through the lobby to get checked in as well all the noise made it hard to hear andor talk. Check in it took over 15 mins to be severed as there was an employee on the phone for the entire time and finally another employee came out to help us. It was very frustrating to find out after check in that they wanted 99 for WiFi. Considering the amount we paid for the room you would think this service would be included in the room cost. When we returned from our evening out we were informed by the lady at the front desk to make sure we get bottles of water from the the front desk for our coffee makers. It was a couple hours later when my husband went down to get the water and the new lady at the counter told us absolutely not and that we could pay for the water if we wanted it for our coffee pot. After travelling all day and just wanting to retire for the night this hotel made it very stressful.

Great service. Staff was SUPER good to us. They provided shuttle service from the airport to the hotel. They also provided shuttle service from the hotel to any of 33 restaurants that were close by. Shuttle service from the hotel and they picked us up from the restaurant. Very happy with how they treated us. Will book here again.
Enjoy our stay. Nice and clean location.

Great place. Would recommend. Very nice having the pull out sofa. Our flight was cancelled and we needed a hotel with shuttle to airport and restaurant which both were great. The shuttle driver did not turn on the air when we went to the airport. Very warm.

My overall experience was nice however I did nt like paying for parking. The front desk clerk told me parking was 16 a day but when I read the book located in the room it showed 12 per day. He told me they recently changed the price to 16. I expressed that was nt my fault and I should only be charged what the facility has in written. At first he refused to refund my money. I had to go back and forth with him a few times. Finally he said I should see a refund but never provided me a receipt. I am still awaiting a refund.

The room was clean friendly staff wonderful breakfast. Male shuttle bus driver that picks you up at airport at night feel like he was not completely truthful we and another family waited 40 minutes for him to arrived at the airport. From the time he backed out of the space at MCO until we pulled in parking lot of hotel was 3 minutes. He says he was stuck in traffic.
Liked the new make over. Loved Happy Hour. Shuttle service was not available ☹ ️ we were reimbursed for cab fare.

20th Anniversary trip cruise. We stayed for one night after a cruise. The hotel is very modern and updated. Breakfast was wonderful. They made eggs to order omelets etc. The staff was extremely helpful and accommodating. The shuttle driver took us to a restaurant nearby for dinner and we called when we were done and he picked us up. Pool hot tub was nice as well.

Served its purpose but overpriced. I love the made to order breakfasts and suite layout. This particular Embassy Suites was crowded due to airport proximity. Beds are always comfortable. Like that they offer happy hour snacks. No Wi Fi unles you ’re an Honors member. Parking fee.

Visited the location a long time ago seen from outside fine but customer services is not that great. My personal experience expected better communication at least complete sentences. Have some experience in Tourism Hospitality and Transportation of guest and I was not impressed. Room for growth will be check guest satisfaction quality of service and hotel appearance alignment of this will help. Employees are not happy.

Visited the location a long time ago seen from outside fine but customer services is not that great. My personal experience expected better communication at least complete sentences. Have some experience in Tourism Hospitality and Transportation of guest and I was not impressed. Room for growth will be check guest satisfaction quality of service and hotel appearance alignment of this will help. Employees are not happy.

Very Good. The room was great and so was the breakfast. Shuttle driver had an attitude because I had parked in front of the door to check in. With attitude insisted I back out and find my parking place. Very arrogant sob. I might add there are NO SIGNS saying I had done anything in the wrong. MGR should have a strong talk with that basturd.
Up to expectations 100 Location is a plus and locals worker are A in customer service. Definitly well deserved 5 stars. This Island ROCKS.
